code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Container,Row,Col,Button,Card}from'react-bootstrap';import ReportForm from'./ReportForm';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LandingPage=()=>{const[selectedOption,setSelectedOption]=useState(null);const[existingJson,setExistingJson]=useState(null);const handleFileUpload=event=>{const file=event.target.files[0];if(file){const reader=new FileReader();reader.onload=e=>{try{const jsonData=JSON.parse(e.target.result);setExistingJson(jsonData);setSelectedOption('existing');}catch(error){alert('Invalid JSON file. Please upload a valid JSON file.');}};reader.readAsText(file);}};if(selectedOption==='new'||selectedOption==='existing'&&existingJson){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReportForm,{initialData:existingJson,onBack:()=>{setSelectedOption(null);setExistingJson(null);}});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"mt-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dhl-form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Report Configuration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{className:"justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Select an Option"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{className:"g-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",className:"dhl-button dhl-button-primary w-100 py-3",onClick:()=>setSelectedOption('new'),children:"Create New JSON"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",className:"dhl-button w-100 py-3 mb-2",onClick:()=>document.getElementById('jsonFileInput').click(),children:"Work with Existing JSON"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",id:"jsonFileInput",accept:".json",onChange:handleFileUpload,style:{display:'none'}})]})})]})]})})})})]})});};export default LandingPage;
